name: Project Chronos
description:
It's ALL about time! Project Chronos is a 2.5D action-adventure platform game made with hard-work and love by five gamers at Sheridan College. Developed in Unity.

Inspired by old-school classics like Metroid, Castlevania and Contra, as well as more modern titles like Braid, Quantum Break and Axiom Verge. We sought to provide a retro-platformer with a time-bending twist we hope you'll enjoy!

Note: Meant to be played with a gamepad.
